relation: Referred to the committee on Health Care Financing
Hearing scheduled for 10/03/2011 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
Reporting date extended to Friday, June 1, 2012
Reporting date extended to Friday, June 29, 2012
Accompanied a study order, see H4533
title: Actions for Bill H.1232
textBeforeTable: SECTION 1. It shall be the policy of the general court to impose a moratorium on all new mandated health benefit legislation until January 2, 2013. Miscellaneous Bill History Bill Text Print Preview Download PDF View Formatted Document Download text: Status: George N. Peterson, Jr. Sponsors: By Mr. Peterson of Grafton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1232) of George N. Peterson, Jr. for legislation to impose a moratorium on health insurance-related mandates. Health Care Financing. Bill Title:
